column5: Anyone have a feel for what to expect lake level wise this spring in NW Ontario? How was the snow pack this year?Thanks
You can check actual water heights and historicals at www.lwcb.ca
Lots of snow this year again. Water levels should be good. Lake Superior at historic highs

Here in the Vermilion Bay area we will have a normal water level.Even with high levels last fall.Snow load was low this last winter and snow mostly gone so as far as run off that was minimal.Water running out of outlets is not as much as some years and it will depend on amount of rain we will get.It is what is.
- - - Off Topic - - - John, I just had to change my signature line when I saw this!!
